some people are like clouds

If God drew anime titties, he'd draw them like this. Praise Lord Itou Eight.
The one that turned me over to the dark side, I love NTR because of Itou Eight, this one is a fucking masterpiece
This is, literally, the best doujin ever made. Greatest art style ever!
Lol, he’s got a picture of me kissing him so I’m going to keep fucking him over and over so he doesn’t tell my husband about the kiss.

@XanderRaidon Agreed,and yeah most of the ntr plot is the reflect perspective of 'our' community but sometimes author didn't really care about the plot but more towards sex scene , ahegao face and some/one got cucked

#AkitoH NTR is actually more realistic than Vanilla. The fact that maritial problems exist is because the woman (and sometimes even the man) aren't Truthful or Straight with each other. Women never tell what they want and sometimes they don't even know themselves. This lack of communication in a couple is the number 1 reason why they break so often. In this manga, the wife did not tell the husband about ANY of her sexual fantasies and her frustrations formed a Mental Barrier in which she thoughts that she can NEVER do these kind of things with her husband.

this is one of the ntr where you did not feel anything at all but still good fap if you disregard the idiocy of the girl. the author is nice not to continue this anymore as obviously it will turn into those where the girl accept it in the end. if there are ntr like this where they do not make it deeper and in the end we will see the force idiocy of the husband and his remorse then it will be good. ntr, where there are no proper conclusion or an epilogue of what happens to them, really makes it bad.
Everyone talking about ntr but I'm complaining about why that woman could easily be Kumagawa mom's (from Medaka Box)
Thus the murder begins
I want a continuation of this
Come on Itou,im just hoping you keep making love story than NTR,NTR is the worst hentai genre and not many people like it at all

Dont weep for the stupid you'll be crying all day.

Amazing amount of ntr with awesome art. Wish he had caught them or something to see his despair but oh well.
Kill all cucks
Wonderful

All started out because of that Silly ass picture...Wow that Woman is Weak as fck, how is an explanation about that Hard to do, as if he wouldn't understand a forced Kiss, if thing where this easy in RL, the World would be in absolute Deep shit, (More then is)

the reason that ntr always has been trash and will continue to be is that in most doujins its a plot device the make the story longer and or deeper than it wouldve been without or to make the story stand out but the problem with that is that it doesnt make the story deeper it jsut makes it worse and even less enjoyable than it couldve been because it completely throws all logic out the window "let me keep getting raped so my husband doesnt find out i was raped instead of just telling him so that he can do something about it" makes absolutey zero sense and you cant argue that. and if you say that doujins arent supposed to have story than just go look at hentai pics instead of reading disphit
Lookin for a plot in porn, lmao. Just whack off and get on with your life....
Most Americans can't handle ntr.it shows how undeveloped they are. I personally love it
ntr is still trash you fucking autists.

i don't understand people here , are they stupids or what . why do these people come and trash talk about the ntr and all . srsly if you don't like ntr n all n you're like "ahh this is shit i like vanilla shit that shit n don't like ntr or blackmail shit" then don't come here talk shit about the ntr hentai and those author who make these hentai . if you don,t like it then fucking comment here shitty people. if you like vanilla then read those why do you even read this . don't you read tags and n all before reading it? are you that idiot . so in the end all i am saying is if you don't like ntr type or similar type of hentai then don't trash talk about it nor about these authors also. if you like vanillla n all just n read all those .
What a fucking trash.

there's no need to make a better plot, you guys just don't understand what NTR is. Just watch any JAV where the wife gets fucked by the boss or some friend. It's not about the plot and it has never been. Get that in your heads vanilla fags.
That make me Triggered

Another blackmail trash. At least make up the plot better. This lemme-rape-yew-so-that-yewr-hubby-won't-find-out-that-you-were-raped was dumb and overused. Seriously, put some thoughts when you draw something. Oh well, rant done. Glad that somebody actually likes it, please enjoy it while it's hot.

So damn good. NTR is best fetish.

good BUT needs a part TWO
too bad no part 2, guess he lacks imagination because this is one of his best work ( girl is hot as fuck )
PLEASE MAKE A PART 2!!!!!!!!!!

I know this is meant to be basic NTR plot so I'd probably look stupid for over-analyzing instead of fapping, but pressing rape charges/sexual harassment charges could've been so easy. Not to mention "rape rumors" and divorce are such weak threats considering she was forced into it, the picture clearly shows she was forced into it(not to mention I'm pretty sure the pic can be recovered even if he deleted it to save himself), and the husband has no reason to distrust her nor leave her, and if he did, he's worse than scum. And let's not forget the raper does everything better than the lover as usual. For once, I'd like to see logic in NTR. But then again, it wouldn't be considered NTR anymore if logic was involved. Sigh, good fap, but plot wise, NTR has gotta be the worst hentai plot among them. Very few realistic ones out there.

I've had this in my favorites since the first day I began to read hentais. DISTANCE, Shinozuka Ryuuji and Itou Eight, holy fucking shit I don't know how many times I "let off" my hidden desires with their work. Salute!

Great art low plot..."Oh god, another man's penis is inside me!" – "No, even though I should hate this [man], my body starts to feel it." – "Aaah… I'm only doing this for my husband…Aahn!" – "Yes! I love this dick!" Although I consider that stuff rather lackluster and sparsely persuasive, I do accept it is the core of NTR-storytelling.
Would be nice if we had part 2
Best one in this site period
Love how she's making loud sounds while the husband is back lol
